title: Arbor Snowboards :: Steve Klassen x The Steepwater
description: The Steepwater, a big mountain “rocket” built for high speed stability in variable terrain, was actualized through a collaboration between Arbor Snowboards and Steve Klassen, owner of Wave Rave snowboard shop in Mammoth, CA and 5x winner of the Verbier Extreme. Steve’s nearly 20 years of R&D experience has allowed us to create a premium, one-of-a-kind snowboard designed with the big mountain enthusiast in mind. This is the story of the Steepwater.
tags: Arbor,Arbor Snowboards,Steve Klassen,Steepwater,Snowboarding,Big Mountain,Verbier,Freeride Tour,Wave Rave,Big Mountain Snowboarding,Freeriding
